sangithawath kale sarath da alwis.migamuwa bandaranayaka chathurasraye sukumar prananduprashnaya - ‘sasural’ hindi chithrapataye pradhana charitha rangapa nalu niliyan kawuda?pilithura - rajendra kumar, saroja dewi, mehemud, lalitha pawar, lila misra.waliwita gayan chathurangaprashnaya - teli natya adhyaksha sudath rohanage lipinaya soya denna?pilithura - di. wi. 2/7, manin tawun, mahal niwasa, kolambaa 08.ihala thalduwe aananda wikramaaarachchiprashnaya - dharmasena pathirajage ‘kadulla’ teli natyaya mulin guwanwiduli natyayak da?pilithura - ow.

me wanawita shri lankawe pawathwena widhayaka janadhipathi pradhana tharan karuwan dedena wana sajith premadasa ha gotabhaya rajapaksha athara ithama thiyunu tharagayak pawathwemin thibena mohothaka shri lanka nidahas pakshaye anagathaya diyaru kara harimata rajapaksha rejimaya wisin ganna lada siyaluma piyawarawal sunuwisunu karamin shri lanka nidahas pakshaye nirmathru ෘ diwangatha es dabliw aar di bandaranayaka mathithumage prathipaththi saha ee gaman mage yamen chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga wisin ada dina thama piyage janatha pakshaya wu shri lanka nidahas pakshaya yatathata pathkara ganimata thiranaya kara thibenawa thiranaya gena aththe shri lanka nidahas pakshikayin dadi kalakirimata pathwa pathkaramin gotabhaya rajapakshata kisidu awasthawakadi janadhipathiwaranayedi sahayogaya laba nodena lesa boho shri lanka nidahas pakshikayin karana lada illimak piliganimin chandrika kumarathunga me wana wita shri lankawata pamina thama piyage pakshaya thama yatathata baragena ada dina sajith premadasa wenuwen ee siyaluma iwara wal ganimin ohu dinawimata awashya bim mattame siyaluma sahayogayak labadimata thiranaya kara thibenawa gotabhaya rajapaksha ge hamudamaya palanaya pilibandawa wishala athdakim samudayak athi shri lankan me awasthawedi dadi kalakirimata pathwa sitinne mewan hamuda palakayek nawatha pathkara ganimata samahara pakshawala saha shri lanka nidahas pakshikayin ge sahayogaya labima owunge dadi doshadarshanayata lakwu thibenawa me nisama ි anagathaye di shri lanka nidahas pakshaya diyaru wi gos pohottuwa balayata pathwima walakwa lima chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga ge dadi adhishtanaya wi atha .
